trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for components that provide design-time support in a designer host for Web server controls that are derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 提供基本类，为控件提供设计时支持，在设计器宿主中为 Web 服务器组件派生自<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: In a designer host, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 在设计器主机中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，描述控件的标记源代码派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>抽象类进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 当用户切换回源视图时，设计时控件持久保存到标记的源代码，并编辑向网页上的标记。

trans-unit.source: The BaseDataListDesigner abstract class serves as a base class for components that provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> in a designer host.
trans-unit.target: BaseDataListDesigner 抽象类用作基类的派生自的控件提供设计时支持的组件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>设计器宿主中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: The BaseDataListDesigner class properties provide the following functionality: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: BaseDataListDesigner 类属性提供了以下功能︰<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A>属性返回<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>对象，它通常包含一个对象，派生自<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>的继承树中的每个级别的设计器类。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> properties provide access to the corresponding properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A>属性提供对关联控件的相应属性的访问。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A> property provides access to the designer of the data source of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A>属性提供对该设计器关联的控件的数据源的访问权限。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A> property gets the default view of the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A>属性获取数据源的默认视图。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A>

trans-unit.source: The BaseDataListDesigner class methods provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: BaseDataListDesigner 类方法提供以下功能:-<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法准备设计器，以查看、 编辑和设计关联的组件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A> method invokes a component editor for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A>方法调用控件的组件编辑器。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to add, remove, or shadow design-time properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>方法用于添加、 删除或隐藏关联控件的设计时属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A> method generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A>方法生成一个可以在设计时使用作为数据源的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method gets the data source from the container of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>方法获取的数据源从关联控件的容器。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method gets the data source from the control container, resolved to a specific data member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>方法获取从控件容器中解析为的特定数据成员的数据源。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A> method gets the data source of the template container.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A>方法获取的数据源的模板容器。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>到关联的控件的更改时调用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method is called when the associated control data source has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>关联的控件的数据源已更改时调用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method is called when the schema of the associated control data source changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>关联的控件的数据源的架构更改时进行调用的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> method is called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A>已应用的自动格式设置方案时，调用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> methods can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when an associated control style has changed or when the designer template-editing verbs have changed, respectively.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A>可以重写方法，以实现应发生当关联的控件样式发生更改时也可以在设计器的模板编辑谓词已发生更改，分别的功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A> method handles the property-builder event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A>方法可处理属性生成器事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>类创建派生自的关联的控件时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>类或该控件的设计图面上的副本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: 获取此设计器的设计器操作列表集合。

trans-unit.source: The ActionLists property creates an empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object and adds the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> that is returned by the ActionLists base property to this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: ActionLists 属性创建一个空<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>对象并将添加<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>返回 ActionLists 基属性到此<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>对象。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: Then it adds it to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, and then returns this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 然后它将其添加到<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>对象，并返回此<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>对象。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref>与此设计器关联。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data key field of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置关联控件的数据键字段的值。

trans-unit.source: The DataKeyField property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: DataKeyField 属性提供从设计器<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>关联的控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>的属性</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>的访问

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> indicates the primary key of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>指示绑定到关联的控件的数据源的主键值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField*> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField*>关联控件的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data member field of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置关联控件的数据成员字段的值。

trans-unit.source: The DataMember property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: DataMember 属性提供从设计器<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>关联的控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>的属性</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>的访问

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> indicates the table or element of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>指示表或数据源绑定到关联的控件的元素。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*>关联控件的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data source property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置关联控件的数据源属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The DataSource property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: 数据源属性提供从设计器<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>关联的控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>的属性</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>的访问

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>关联控件的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer of the data source, when one is selected for data binding.
trans-unit.target: 一个选择用于数据绑定时，请获取数据源的设计器。

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceDesigner property returns the designer for the data source of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: DataSourceDesigner 属性返回的数据源的关联从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>派生的控件的设计器

trans-unit.source: The designer object implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: 设计器的对象实现<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The designer for the data source of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 设计器中为关联控件的数据源的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the designer's version of the data source ID property and is used to shadow the corresponding property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置设计器的版本的数据源 ID 属性，用于隐藏关联控件的相应属性。

trans-unit.source: Setting the designer's DataSourceID property causes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the associated control to be set.
trans-unit.target: 设置设计器的 DataSourceID 属性会导致<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>要设置的关联控件的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the DataSourceID is set to a <xref:System.String>, indicating a new data source is to be defined, a **Create Data Source** dialog box is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 DataSourceID 设置为<xref:System.String>，，该值指示新的数据源的定义，**创建数据源**对话框随即显示。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the DataSourceID is set to a <xref:System.String> indicating there is no data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> is set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果 DataSourceID 设置为<xref:System.String>，该值指示没有任何数据源，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>设置为空字符串 ("")。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is the data source ID of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>即关联控件的数据源 ID。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 获取数据源绑定到关联的控件的默认视图。

trans-unit.source: The DesignerView property gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control by passing the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: DesignerView 属性获取通过传递绑定到关联的控件的数据源的默认视图<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no view is returned or the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> is used to get the view names and the first view name is used to get the default view.
trans-unit.target: 如果不返回任何视图，或<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>未设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>用于获取视图名称和第一个视图名称用于获取默认视图。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> representing the default view of the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"> </xref>表示数据源的默认视图。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the designer and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放设计器使用的非托管的资源，还可以释放托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: If the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class has a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface, the Dispose method disconnects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果关联控制派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>类具有<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>实现的属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>接口，断开连接的 Dispose 方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> method, the Dispose disconnects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> events.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>方法，则释放断开<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved>事件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose also disconnects the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> events of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: 释放还会断开连接<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed>的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>

trans-unit.source: It finally calls the Dispose base method.
trans-unit.target: 最后，它调用 Dispose 基方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: 生成一个可以在设计时使用作为数据源的对象。

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeDataSource method attempts to construct a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object from the data source that is defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: GetDesignTimeDataSource 方法尝试构造<xref:System.Data.DataTable>对象定义的数据源的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: If this is not possible, it creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> from dummy data.
trans-unit.target: 如果这不是可能的它将创建<xref:System.Data.DataTable>根据虚拟数据。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows of sample data that the data source should contain.
trans-unit.target: 最小的数据源应包含的示例数据的行数。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains dummy data; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains data from an actual data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果返回的数据源包含虚拟数据;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果返回的数据源包含实际的数据源中的数据。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface that serves as a data source for use at design time.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，实现<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>用作在设计时使用的数据源的接口。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: 生成一个可以在设计时使用作为数据源的对象。

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeDataSource method attempts to construct a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object from the data source that is specified by the `selectedDataSource` parameter.
trans-unit.target: GetDesignTimeDataSource 方法尝试构造<xref:System.Data.DataTable>对象指定的数据源的`selectedDataSource`参数。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: If this is not possible, it creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> from dummy data.
trans-unit.target: 如果这不是可能的它将创建<xref:System.Data.DataTable>根据虚拟数据。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> that is used as a template for the data format.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，实现<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>用于作为模板的数据格式。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows of sample data that the data source data should contain.
trans-unit.target: 最小的数据源数据应包含的示例数据的行数。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains dummy data; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains data from an actual data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果返回的数据源包含虚拟数据;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果返回的数据源包含实际的数据源中的数据。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface that serves as a data source for use at design time.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，实现<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>用作在设计时使用的数据源的接口。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container, resolved to a specific data member.
trans-unit.target: 从关联的控件容器中解析为的特定数据成员获取数据源组件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> properties of the associated control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>方法使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>方法来构造从由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>关联的控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>属性</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>指定的对象的数据源</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> of the associated control, resolved to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*> parameter; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a data source is not found.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，实现<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>接口包含设计时<> *1> 关联的控件，并解析为的<> *1> 参数; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到数据源。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container.
trans-unit.target: 从关联的控件容器中获取数据源组件。

trans-unit.source: The GetSelectedDataSource method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property of the associated control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: GetSelectedDataSource 方法使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法来构造从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>关联控件的属性</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>指定的对象的数据源</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> property of the associated control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a data source is not found.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，实现<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>接口包含设计时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>关联控件的属性; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到数据源。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source of the template's container.
trans-unit.target: 获取模板的容器的数据源。

trans-unit.source: The GetTemplateContainerDataSource method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> properties of the associated control derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: GetTemplateContainerDataSource 方法调用的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>方法来构造从由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>关联的控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>属性</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>指定的对象的数据源</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the name of the template for which to get the data source.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，它指定要为其获取数据源模板的名称。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An object that implements an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing a design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: 实现的对象<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>接口包含设计时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 准备设计器，以查看、 编辑和设计关联的组件。

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: 准备好使用设计器来呈现从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>派生的控件时，设计器宿主调用 Initialize 方法

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Initialize 方法和其基方法配置属性，并连接到所需的设计器操作的事件。

trans-unit.source: The Initialize connects to the design-time data source and updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: 初始化连接到设计时数据源，并更新的设计时标记。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interface, the Initialize connects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> events.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>属性实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>接口，初始化连接<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved>事件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the control, derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>, that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: `component`参数是控件，派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>，即与此设计器中或一份该控件关联。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: A control derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref>, which implements an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 派生的控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"> </xref>，该类实现<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Invokes a component editor for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 调用关联控件的组件编辑器。

trans-unit.source: The InvokePropertyBuilder method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> object, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method of the component editor.
trans-unit.target: InvokePropertyBuilder 方法创建<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>或<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor>对象，并调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>方法的组件编辑器。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>

trans-unit.source: The index of the page with which to initialize the component editor.
trans-unit.target: 用来初始化该组件编辑器页的索引。

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AutoFormat" name="AutoFormat" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref uid="langword_csharp_AutoFormat" name="AutoFormat" href=""></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnAutoFormat method is obsolete and has no functionality.
trans-unit.target: OnAutoFormat 方法已过时，并没有任何功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，引发的事件。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据的对象。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 当自动格式设置方案已应用到关联的控件时调用。

trans-unit.source: The OnAutoFormatApplied method is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object is applied to the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>对象应用于关联控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>时，被调用 OnAutoFormatApplied 方法

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object defines a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle> object that is applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>对象定义<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle>应用于控件的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>

trans-unit.source: A designer can override the OnAutoFormatApplied to inspect properties of the control or to take some other action.
trans-unit.target: 设计器可以重写 OnAutoFormatApplied 要检查控件的属性，或采取某种其他操作。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat"></xref> object that defines a style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat"> </xref>对象，用于定义一种样式。

trans-unit.source: Called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 当关联控件的更改时调用。

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentChanged method is called when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class executes.
trans-unit.target: OnComponentChanged 方法调用时<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>派生自的控件的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>类执行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change).
trans-unit.target: 通常，这是为了响应在控件上的属性更改 (例如，**属性**网格更改)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> object to which the control is bound is changed, the control is redrawn on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>控件绑定到的对象发生更改时，控件重绘设计图面上。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，它是事件源。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 当关联控件的数据源已更改时调用。

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceChanged base method connects the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class to the current data source, and if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, the method updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: OnDataSourceChanged 基方法连接关联的控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>类到当前的数据源，方法是从连接控件的数据源不同，如果更新的设计时标记。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the property-builder event.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理属性生成器事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The OnPropertyBuilder method invokes a component editor for the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: 此 OnPropertyBuilder 方法将调用从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>派生的关联控件的组件编辑器

trans-unit.source: It creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> object, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method of the component editor.
trans-unit.target: 它将创建<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>或<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor>对象，并调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>方法的组件编辑器。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，它是事件源。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据的对象。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.
trans-unit.target: 关联控件的数据源的架构更改时调用。

trans-unit.source: Unless the designer is in template-editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the OnSchemaRefreshed method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method, which in turn calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> control to reflect the data source change.
trans-unit.target: 除非该设计器是在模板编辑模式下或域中正在添加或编辑 OnSchemaRefreshed 方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>方法，后者反过来调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>方法来更新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>控件以反映数据源更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when a style of the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 可以重写以实现关联控件的样式已更改时应执行的功能。

trans-unit.source: The OnStylesChanged method can serve as notification that a style of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class has changed.
trans-unit.target: OnStylesChanged 方法可用作通知关联的样式控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>类已更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when the designer template-editing verbs have changed.
trans-unit.target: 可以重写以实现已更改的设计器的模板编辑谓词时应执行的功能。

trans-unit.source: The OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged method can be implemented to perform additional processing, such recording that a change has occurred, when the template-editing verbs change.
trans-unit.target: 可实现 OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged 方法来执行其他处理，例如录制发生了更改，当模板编辑谓词更改时。

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 在设计器中用于移除属性或添加其他属性的显示中**属性**网格或隐藏关联控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: 控件设计器使用派生自的方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法隐藏各种控件属性，用相应的设计时属性设计器实现，并将添加到属性或删除属性从**属性**网格。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class, the PreFilterProperties creates design-time properties to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>类，PreFilterProperties 创建设计时属性，以隐藏<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: 集合实现<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>的添加和隐藏的属性的接口。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema*>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema*>。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the schema can be refreshed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以刷新架构;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to disable data-binding events until after the schema has been refreshed; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to enable the events.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要禁用在架构之前的数据绑定事件已刷新;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>以启用事件。
